s.text: A NYT piece reports that a 5 feet, 5 inches, 125-pound woman hopes to strike a blow for feminism by fighting a male lightweight in boxing's officially sanctioned first intergender bout.
The New York Times reveals that nonprofits, including churches, pocketed millions in Federal grants that are designated to feed poor children.
